name: Pine Japanese Language Afterschool
description: Pine Japanese Language Afterschool (school age children - 6 and older) is an academic program. Lessons are taught in Japanese and English. The curriculum focus on the Japanese culture, exposing the children to traditional Japanese holidays and celebrating them throughout the school year. The Japanese Language Afterschool operates from 3:30pm-5:30pm on Tuesdays, Wednesdays and Thursdays. There is a SFUSD school bus which leaves from JBBP West Elementary School and drops children off one-half bloc

howToGetIt: Contact: Judy Yi at (415) 387-9111 for more information regarding waiting list, enrollment and fees.
cost: This is a fee based service.
